# Copilot Instructions for MARLO (Spring Boot Hexagonal Clean Architecture)

- [x] Base structure created with Maven and Spring Boot
- [x] Hexagonal and clean architecture applied
- [x] MySQL connection configured
- [x] Example REST service implemented
- [x] Swagger configuration included
- [x] Unit tests and JaCoCo configured
- [x] Ready for local execution, Docker, and Lambda

Follow the steps in the README to run and customize the MARLO project.
